title: Default task
description: The default task that will be running when no other tasks are queued.  Typically just standing still.

worldmodel.description: JSON worldmodel describing the robot and its environment

etaslfile.description: etaslfile, you normally leave this to the default

etasl.title: eTaSL
etasl.description: Optional parameters to tune eTaSL. Typically not needed for a default-task because default input- and outputhandlers are better set in the default etasl parameters, because they typically need to be active for all tasks.
